desc: The only store where the fatherless can express their greatness despite being fatherless. The Fatherless Store gives the fatherless the opportunity to finally find out why they are fatherless.

layout.text: Don't Let Growing Up Fatherless Keep You In Victim Mode!
Here at The Fatherless Store you get access to dozens of important programs to help you make it through your struggles of growing up without your father.
